item.title: @elonmusk: X is the best source for financial news -- and hundreds of billions of dollars are deployed based on...
item.description: X is the best source for financial news -- and hundreds of billions of dollars are deployed based on things people read here. We are building Smart Cashtags that allow you to specify the exact asset (or smart contract) when posting a ticker. From Timeline, users will be able to tap them to see its real-time price along with all mentions of that asset. We're aiming to collect feedback as we iterate toward a public release next month.

item.title: @elonmusk: Update your@grokapp to v1.3.33 for more enhancements to Imagine: -Better image and video quality: Ou...
item.description: Update your@grokapp to v1.3.33 for more enhancements to Imagine: -Better image and video quality: Outputs are sharper, with more detailed and realistic rendering, including improved lighting, textures, and ethereal effects. -Faster generation speeds: Creation times are significantly reduced, often completing in seconds for quicker iterations. -Increased creativity and accuracy: Imagine handles complex prompts more effectively, producing more innovative and precise results that better match user intentions.

item.title: @elonmusk: Good point, it will actually be way worse, because there will be no America preventing the worst atr...

item.title: @elonmusk: Rage, Rage against the South Africanization of America The favela and its denizens are creeping in. ...
item.description: Rage, Rage against the South Africanization of America The favela and its denizens are creeping in. Violent crime, fraud, vagrancy, and the like are all getting worse. Life is getting uglier, public services less reliable, and regulation more stifling The yoke can still be broken, the chains of thralldom to the race communists still thrown off But we can't do so with a shrug or by being quiet

item.title: @elonmusk: I will never stop. REMIGRATION TILL I DIE!
item.description: I will never stop. REMIGRATION TILL I DIE!

item.title: @elonmusk: In Sweden, we have 60 no-go zones. Not long ago we had zero. That tells you everything you need to k...
item.description: In Sweden, we have 60 no-go zones. Not long ago we had zero. That tells you everything you need to know about our politicians. We need a leader like Nayib Bukele.

item.title: @elonmusk: $250 MILLION. That‚Äôs how much taxpayer money was stolen in just one fraud scheme‚ÄîMinnesota‚Äôs ‚ÄúFeedin...
item.description: $250 MILLION. That‚Äôs how much taxpayer money was stolen in just one fraud scheme‚ÄîMinnesota‚Äôs ‚ÄúFeeding Our Future‚Äù scandal. One state. One program. Quarter of a billion dollars‚Äîgone. This isn‚Äôt incompetence. It‚Äôs a system designed for theft.
